page.title: 07Major Roads
page.content:
The major existing road was the A1(M), a motorway that started just south of this area and ran north towards Welwyn Garden City. The road was completely cut off from the surrounding smaller roads - one od which was the old A1. The A6 left the A1 just to the south of the area, and this also was heavily used by traffic.
To the south, the new London Orbital Motorway, the M25, was being constructed. The eastern part was finished, but building the western link was causing major disruptions to village life. There was a large encampment of road-builders caravans in one place.
